name: Zombie City - Clicker Tycoon
description:
Welcome to Zombie City, new idle game, or tap game. Zombies are back!
It's time to take your city back from dead zombie horde, one click at a time!

Are you looking for a zombie themed game that brings you a great purpose and the ability to further survive in a post apocalyptic world? Try this City Builder Tycoon. Like in all the best clickers, the Zombie City App also allows you to mine money in order to become rich! It's business.

How to play Zombie City - Clicker Tycoon:
- TAP - tap - tap. CLICK - click - click.
- TAP to make money.
- TAP to defeat zombies.
- RECRUIT survivors and cops to help you rebuild the post apocalyptic town.
- BUILD new buildings and expand your city.
- COMPLETE all quests.
- PRESTIGE and cash in your progress.
ENJOY the full RPG experience on the go

Welcome to the Zombie City - Clicker Business Tycoon, where you can defeat the zombies and rebuild your city.
Oh... I meant congratulations! You are now a Sheriff! It's time to build your city back.
Start small and grow rich. Hire survivors, invest in equipment, buildings and cops to fight the zombies, survive in post apocalyptic city, rebuild your city and become a true billionaire.
You have to tap the screen of your device to make money and fight with zombie.
The more you tap, the more you earn and the stronger you are. Poor Zombies :(

Have you ever wanted to run your own city!? Maybe you wanted to fight with zombies?
Start today virtually with this amazing Idle Game!
Your goal will be to defeat all the zombies and expand your new city! Feel the authenticity of zombie fights and a money clicker in the best clicker game available!

This is a clicker game that is highly addictive! Make sure to train your fingers and be ready to have a lot of fun!

!!Warning!! HIGHLY ADDICTIVE CONTENT! Once you start playing Zombie City - Clicker Business Tycoon, you can't put it away!


FEATURES
💀 Incremental game progress with prestige system
💀 One finger tap attack
💀 Upgrade weapons, spells, and equipment
💀 An all-new incremental clicker game for people who love to click
💀 Pretend to be rich zombie fighter and impress everyone
